author: thomreis
body:
Upgrades for the L1T muon DQM

- Reduce number of bins for uGMT histograms.
- Retune quality tests.
- Move some uGMT quality tests to separate muon quality test configurations for all runs and additional tests fro collisions runs.
- Add OMTF quality tests.
title: L1T muon DQM upgrades
